attributes.action: Allow members of the emergency services to jump the que when working a shift
attributes.background: This petition would allow any member of the emergency services working a shift to be able to jump the ques in cafes ec. Incase an emergency was to be attend to they would have a better chance of having a meal before going on their way to help others in need.

rejection.details:
At the moment, this would be a decision for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you'd like Parliament to make this a legal requirement, you could start a new petition asking for that. 

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226375
